mean_cn: n. 野生动植物；  adj. 野生动植物的
mean_en: animals, birds, insects, etc. that are wild and live in a natural environment
sentence: There is a variety of wildlife, such as giraffes and elephants, living in this area.
sentence_trans: 这个地区生活着各种各样的野生动物，如长颈鹿和大象。
word_etyma: wild野生的 + life生命 → wildlife野生动植物
